params.bases: The list of ChainLink aggregator bases
params.quotes: The list of ChainLink aggregator quotes, currently support 'ETH' and 'USD'

params.admin_: The address of admin to set aggregators

params.cToken: The cToken to get the underlying price of

getUnderlyingPrice(address).return: The underlying asset price mantissa (scaled by 1e18)

_setAdmin(address).notice: Set admin for price oracle proxy

_setAggregators(address[],address[],addr.notice: Set ChainLink aggregators for multiple tokens

_setGuardian(address).notice: Set guardian for price oracle proxy

getUnderlyingPrice(address).notice: Get the underlying price of a listed cToken asset
